name: Star War (zloyalex)
description:
Welcome to galactic wars, a space turn-based strategy game. Build ships, capture planets and defeat all opponents!

You need to think over a strategy for capturing the entire galaxy. Gather the most powerful squad and fight the strongest opponent!

Game Features:

✔ The game is simple and clear.

✔ Two difficulty levels.

✔ Three card sizes.

✔ Different types of planets.

✔ Step by step mode.
